structural_unit_name.en: School of Theology and Religious Studies

description.en: Arabic script, grammar and pronunciation of Classical Arabic, linguistic context of the Quran.
description.et: Araabia tähestik, klassikalise araabia grammatika ning hääldus, koraani keeleline kontekst.

objectives.en: The student will be introduced to the the script, pronunciation and grammar of Quranic and Classical Arabic. The student will gain an overview of the relationship and differences between Quranic and Classical Arabic.
objectives.et: Kursuse jooksul tutvub tudeng klassikalise ning koraani araabia keele tähestiku ja hääldusega grammatika alustega. Tudeng omandab ülevaade suhtest ning erinevustest koraani ning klassikalise araabia keele vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of this course, the student will be able to read, write, and pronounce the Arabic script and will have gained a basic understanding of Classical Arabic grammar. The student will understand in what linguistic environment the Quran came into being.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse lõpuks on tudeng võimeline araabia tähestikku lugema, kirjutama ning välja hääldama ja on omandanud baasteadmised klassikalise araabia keele grammatikast. Tudeng mõistab, millises keelelises kontekstis koraan alguse sai.

independent_work.et: see F. Abu-Chacra, Arabic Around the World.

grade_evaluation.et: Active participation in the class and the final examination.

resources.mandatory_materials: F. Abu-Chacra, Arabic Around the World.
resources.recommended_materials: H. Wehr, M. Cowan, Dictionary of Modern Literary Arabic.
